page.title: 03SUPERNATURAL
page.content: {Plas Mawr}on the High Street in Conwy is famous for the ghost in its Lantern Room.{Robert Wynne,}a wealthy merchant and master of the house was away and his wife was awaiting his return on the step of the house with her son and expectant child On her way down the High Street they both fell down the stairs where later her housemaid found her and her son. She called for the doctor but the one who came wasn't the normal family doctor. They locked him in the lantern room with the bodies to deal with them . When he heard of Robert Wynne returning he hid up the chimney as he knew that he coundn't do anything for the two of them. To this day Wynne is supposed to walk around the room looking for the doctor. by Kerry Rew aged 15
